Query.Title: Returns Offering Date For Fixed Income Securities
Query.ReqPackage: Transactions, Transactions MandA Consideration, Transactions MandA Core, Transactions Offering
Query.Description: The following sample SQL query returns the offering date for fixed-income offering of corporate bonds closed during 2017 for issuers located in specific countries using the SP Capital IQ Transactions package in Xpressfeed

Query.Title: Returns Financials
Query.Description: The following sample SQL query returns the financials for a company using the SP Capital IQ Transactions package in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Returns IPO Transaction Prices
Query.ReqPackage: Transactions MandA Consideration, Transactions MandA Core, Transactions Offering
Query.Description: The following sample SQL query returns the IPO Transaction Prices using the SP Capital IQ Transaction Offering packages in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Returns Consideration Details For A Transaction
Query.ReqPackage: Transactions MandA Consideration, Transactions MandA Core
Query.Description: The following sample SQL query returns the consideration details including Consideration to Shareholders, Offer Per Share, and Total Stock for a specific transaction using the SP Capital IQ Transaction packages in Xpressfeed

Query.Title: Returns Tender Offer Transactions With Percent Sought Greater Than Percent Acquired
Query.ReqPackage: Transactions, Transactions MandA Consideration, Transactions MandA Core
Query.Description: The following sample SQL query returns MA transactions for tender offers where the percent sought on the announced date is greater than the percent acquired on the final date using the SP Capital IQ tables in Xpressfeed.

Query.Title: Returns Regulation D Offerings
Query.ReqPackage: Transactions, Transactions MandA Consideration, Transactions MandA Core
Query.Description: The following sample SQL query rovide workarounds to screen the SP Capital IQ Transactions package for Regulation D offerings in Xpressfeed. Note: Uncomment the second query for Private Placement Transactions (To optimize time select for Top 10000 companyIds)
